trans-unit.source: Provides a parent class for all three-dimensional transformations, including translation, rotation, and scale transformations.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en overordnet klasse for alle tredimensjonale transformasjoner, inkludert oversettelsen, rotasjon og skalaen transformasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class to create transformations not available from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> classes.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>klassen for å opprette transformasjoner er ikke tilgjengelig fra den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skygger arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering når som helst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, kopierer denne metoden ressursen referanser og data bindinger (de ikke kan løse), men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skygger arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering når som helst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity transformation.
trans-unit.target: Henter transformeringen identitet.

trans-unit.source: The identity transformation has the effect of multiplying the object by the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: ID-transformeringen er resultatet av å multiplisere objektet med matrise.

trans-unit.source: Identity transformation.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjonen som identitet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the inverse transformation of this object, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Henter den inverse transformasjonen for dette objektet hvis mulig.

trans-unit.source: Inverse is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Inverse introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Motsatte av denne forekomsten, hvis det er mulig; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the matrix is affine.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om matrisen affinitet.

trans-unit.source: An affine transformation preserves collinearity.
trans-unit.target: En affinitet transformering beholder kolinearitet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the matrix is affine; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis matrisen affinitet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overfører angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Point3D to transform.
trans-unit.target: Point3D til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: Transformed Point3D.
trans-unit.target: Transformert Point3D.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Overfører den angitte matrisen for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Array of Point3D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: Matrise Point3D som skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overfører angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Point4D to transform.
trans-unit.target: Point4D til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: Transformed Point4D.
trans-unit.target: Transformert Point4D.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Overfører den angitte matrisen for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Array of Point4D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: Matrise Point4D som skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overfører angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Vector3D to transform.
trans-unit.target: Vector3D til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: Transformed Vector3D.
trans-unit.target: Transformert Vector3D.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Overfører den angitte matrisen for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Array of Vector3D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: Matrise Vector3D som skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
trans-unit.target: Overfører angitte 3D avgrensende boksen, og returnerer en akse justert 3D avgrensende, som er nøyaktig stort nok til den.

trans-unit.source: TransformBounds is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: TransformBounds introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The 3-D bounding box to transform.
trans-unit.target: 3D avgrensende for å gjøre.

trans-unit.source: The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed rect.
trans-unit.target: Minste akse justert 3D avgrensende boksen mulig som inneholder den transformerte rect .

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Prøver å transformeringen angitte 3D punktet, og returnerer en verdi som angir om transformeringen var vellykket.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>metode, denne metoden ikke iverksette et unntak hvis transformeringen mislykkes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: TryTransform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: TryTransform introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The 3-D point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 3D punktet til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming `inPoint`.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av transformere `inPoint`.

trans-unit.source: if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis inPoint er transformert; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that represents the value of the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> som representerer gjeldende transformeringen-verdien.

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that represents the value of the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: Matrix3D som representerer gjeldende transformeringen-verdien.
